---
title: "install() the package"
---

1.  We are ready to install the package. Type "install()" in the console

2.  You can now search your package in the "Packages" tab and see that your package is installed

3.  Test to make sure the package is working

    ``` r
    strsplit1(x, ",")
    ```

Output: "alpha" "beta" "charlie" "delta"
